title: Finance Manger
content:
Job Description

Financial manager is responsible for providing financial guidance and support to clients and colleagues so they can make sound business decisions. In addition, care must be taken to ensure that financial practices are in line with all statutory legislation and regulations. Financial managers may also be known as financial analysts or business analysts.

Responsibilities

 

·         Providing and interpreting financial information.

·         Monitoring and interpreting cash flows and predicting future trends.

·         Analyzing change and advising accordingly.

·         Formulating strategic and long-term business plans.

·         Researching and reporting on factors influencing business performance.

·         Analyzing competitors and market trends.

·         Developing financial management mechanisms that minimize financial risk.

·         Conducting reviews and evaluations for cost-reduction opportunities.

·         Managing a company's financial accounting, (book keeping), monitoring and reporting systems (Quarterly basis Reports).

·         Taxation and file return submission timely.

·         Developing external relationships with appropriate contacts, e.g. Suppliers, Clients, Bankers and Statutory organizations such as the Inland Revenue.

·         Producing accurate financial reports to specific deadlines.

·         Managing budgets.

·         Keeping abreast of changes in financial regulations and legislation.

 

Requirements

 

·         MBA Finance/ACCA

·         3-4 Years’ Experience.

 

·         Lahore

Skills

Accounting Consultation, Finance, Excel, Microsoft

content:

  • Submit payment documents to finance and keep follow-up of payments status.
  • Attend program coordination meetings and respond to quires related to procurement cases.

title: Senior System Analyst
content:
Job Description

SlashNext is a team of malware researchers and scientist assembled to provide leading security solutions. We are always in quest of experts who can add value to our company and for that we are looking for System Analyst. Key activities for desired role would be to design and publish guideline which will be followed during SDLC for product / project. You are also required to conduct regular audits to monitor whether defined practices are aligned or not. As a part of daily task you will be strongly supporting to project teams through technical documentation & product solution design. You must be very proficient at translating high-level business requirements into detailed functional requirements for efficient development and project completion. Additionally, you will also perform standard testings and provide solutions to meet quality deliverables. System Analyst report to the VP Engineering and will engage with other stakeholders, including: Project Managers, Developers, Software / QA Engineers, Graphics Team.

Responsibilities:

  • Provide technical design and architectural support across project teams
  • Interact directly with business-oriented internal stakeholders
  • Create supporting documentation and processes for new technology configurations, customizations and functionalities available to clients
  • Mapping and documenting interfaces between legacy and new systems
  • Be comfortable navigating database & other technical visualization tools
  • Produce high-level visuals and diagrams of solution designs
  • Translating client (Internal & External) requirements into highly specified project briefs
  • Identifying options for potential solutions and assessing them for both technical and business suitability
  • Ensure project documents are complete and placed appropriately against defined repository
  • Overseeing implementation of a new system including data migration
  • Collaborate with the technical leads, developers and participating project teams to ensure technical detail are well communicated to relevant stakeholders
  • Providing training and user manuals to users of a new system
  • Keeping up to date with technical and industry developments tools & technology
  • Work with QA to create and execute Quality Assurance test plans to validate functional requirements

Desired Skills:

  • Logical & strong analytical approach to problem solving
  • Having methodical, investigative and inquisitive mind
  • Creating VISIO, UML, Data Flow Diagrams, Functional Design Diagrams, ERD, Functional Specification
  • Comfortable with developing application architecture using tools like Enterprise Architect, Lucidchart, Draw.io etc
  • Describing a Service Oriented Architecture (SOA), API Stack, and Overall Technology in Relation to Given Business Use Cases
  • Writing and translating Business Requirements to Functional Requirements
  • Learning, Researching and Embracing the Loyalty industry
  • An interest in the way organizational processes work • Pro-activeness and self-confidence

content:

title: Content Writer
content:
Job Description

We are looking for a dynamic, self-motivated individual with experience and skills in web content management, writing and editing for the web.

The individual will be responsible for developing the content for all aspects of the organizations online presence. In addition to this he will also be crafting content for site promotions, email newsletters, and online outreach campaigns.

Exceptionally strong research skills and ability to grasp new and complex technology/business related topics is required. In addition, strong communications skills are required as the individual will be working closely with technical, business development, and marketing members of our organization.

The ideal candidate will have experience managing online content and outreach campaigns and will obsess about copy. Tasks require a strong attention to detail and ability to work under tight deadlines.

Responsibilities

  • Create, develop and manage content for organizations web presence (requires working with content management software)
  • Conducting in-depth and accurate research on new subjects/topics/ideas
  • Working with a cross-departmental team, maintain and develop the master content calendar for all web properties
  • Copy edit and proofread all web content
  • Oversee freelancers, including writers, copy editors and community outreach organizers
  • Keep current with emerging web technologies through relevant blogs, websites, lists and events
  • Work cooperatively with key team members, clients and vendors

title: Legal Associate
content:
Job Description

Legal Solutions, a well reputed firm located at SAF Centre, is looking for a legal associate with an outstanding academic record, who has demonstrated initiative, maturity, and congeniality, and who is interested in taking on significant responsibilities. Successful candidates will possess excellent analytical and writing skills, including the ability to draft legal and corporate documents and provide persuasive arguments on key issues. New attorneys typically begin appearing in court , full of energy, must be able to work in competitive environment.Job Details:1. Contribute to formulate and develop strategy and plans for the legal department to ensure the legal policy implementation and adherence.2. Provide input on legal matters related to lawsuits regarding to Constitutional, Civil and Corporate Law.3. Assist on legal matters such as updating agreements, issuing necessary documents to meet the requirements of Federal and Provincial Law and maintain the companies prescribed legal position.4. Interpret laws, rulings and regulations.5. Provide legal advice on potential liability in order to take necessary steps to control exposure.6. Formulate, provide and review all contracts agreements between the company and third parties.7. Maintain custody of legal documents to ensure information and security handling.8. Assist in legal proceedings to help and improve the collection of the receivables and defend the company’s interests.9. Research and assist on day to day legal concerns as and when required.Requirements:1. Bachelors of Law (LLB) with Honors; preferably from UK or US.2. Experience of 1 to 5 years.3. Excellent proficiency in English.4. Proven track record of drafting, reviewing and revising agreements.5. Substantial litigation experience in the courts of Lahore.6. Knowledge of local and international laws and regulations.7. Expertise in Constitutional, Civil and Company Law.8. Should be proficient in research.9. Should be highly proactive with a can do attitude.10. Should be able to correspond with our legal team.
